data.title: Top 10 Real Estate Companies in Saudi Arabia
data.meta_description: Saudi Arabia’s real estate sector has been one of the largest contributors to the country, with a significant impact. As a result, the country witnessed many real estate companies operating in the market. These companies provide various services, including property development, buying and selling, consultation, and management. Investing in the real estate sector in Saudi...
data.text:
Saudi Arabia’s real estate sector has been one of the largest contributors to the country, with a significant impact. As a result, the country witnessed many real estate companies operating in the market. These companies provide various services, including property development, buying and selling, consultation, and management.

Investing in the real estate sector in Saudi Arabia can be a viable option for those looking to diversify their investment portfolio. With the country’s rising economy and demand for property, the sector offers various opportunities for investors. Investors can benefit from the country’s real estate sector’s growth and development by choosing the right company.

Rafal

Rafal Real Estate is one of the leading real estate companies in Saudi Arabia. The company started out in 2007 with Ibrahim A. Abunayyan and Brothers and Arabian Tawazon for Commercial Investment to develop landmark real estate properties. It is currently in KSA’s capital, Riyadh.

Rafal Real Estate is known for its distinguished communities that provide extravagant lifestyles, offering investors and clients a real opportunity to live and invest in the most luxurious and modern residential and commercial communities in Saudi Arabia. The company’s residential and commercial communities are top-of-the-line in Saudi Arabia.

The company’s flagship project is the “Alegria” Model Project, located in the heart of the Narjes neighbourhood, Riyadh. The project offers modern and luxurious villas and apartments with world-class amenities. The project is designed to provide a unique lifestyle to its residents, offering a wide range of facilities, including a swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, and a kid’s area.

AlSaedan

AlSaedan Development is one of Saudi Arabia’s leading real estate companies. With a strong profile of developmental achievements in plan development, it is constructing residential and commercial projects, selling and buying local and international real estate, and providing consultation. Moreover, AlSaedan has earned a reputation for excellence and reliability.

The company believes in the real estate sector’s desire for quality and innovation. AlSaedan has since established itself as a trusted name in the industry, with a strong focus on customer satisfaction and quality service.

AlSaedan has a diverse portfolio of residential, commercial, and industrial properties. The company has developed several prestigious projects, such as the AlSaedan Towers, located in the heart of Riyadh, and the AlSaedan Business Tower, which is located in Jeddah.

AlSaedan has a team of experienced professionals committed to providing their clients with the best possible service. The company strongly focuses on innovation and uses the latest technology to ensure its clients receive the best possible service.

Tawkeed

Tawkeed Real Estate is a Saudi Arabian development company that offers real estate services, including investment management, property management, leasing and brokerage, development, and project management.

The company has a team of experienced professionals knowledgeable about the Saudi Arabian market. They work closely with customers to cater to their needs and provide solutions that meet their requirements.

One of the notable achievements of Tawkeed Real Estate is its involvement in the Saudi Aramco IPO. The company played a significant role in the IPO, which aimed to raise $100 billion for the state-owned oil company. The IPO took place in late 2019, and Saudi Aramco’s valuation reached $1.7 trillion, making it the world’s most valuable company.

Tawkeed Real Estate commits to delivering exceptional services to its clients. The company is constantly improving to stay ahead of the real estate competition. With its extensive experience and expertise in the Saudi Arabian real estate market, Tawkeed Real Estate is a top choice for clients looking for reliable and professional real estate services.

ABYATONA

ABYATONA is a Saudi Arabian real estate development company that has been in operation for over 25 years. ABYATONA’s vision is to provide comprehensive and advanced services that contribute to changing the housing pattern in the Kingdom.

ABYATONA has a portfolio of residential, commercial, and administrative developments. Their projects enjoy strategic locations as well as top-notch services. ABYATONA is a leading real estate development company in Saudi Arabia committed to providing high-quality living spaces for its customers. With a strong focus on innovation, sustainability, and environmental responsibility, ABYATONA aims to continue its success in the Saudi Arabian real estate market.

Jannat

Jannat Real Estate is one of the leading real estate companies in Saudi Arabia. The company was founded in Saudi Arabia and is composed of a young, professional, and knowledgeable staff in the field of real estate. They started their journey with ten real estate development projects to grow and create solid partnerships and a strong client base.

Jannat Real Estate has a long-standing reputation for providing high-quality services to its clients. The company is known for its real estate development, sales, and marketing expertise.

The company adopted the vision of the Kingdom 2030, implementing innovation in every aspect of its projects. They have a team of experts who are well-informed about the latest trends and technologies in the real estate market.

Jannat Real Estate is a reliable and trustworthy company that provides exceptional services to its clients. They have a strong presence in the market and commit to providing the best solutions to their client’s real estate needs.

Banan Real Estate

Banan Real Estate began its journey in 1426 AH and is headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. The company is known for developing innovative real estate projects that contribute to the development of society and is working towards achieving the vision of Saudi Arabia 2030.

Banan Real Estate commits to providing world-class properties that cater to the needs of its clients. It has a team of experienced professionals dedicated to delivering high-end facilities and services to its customers. The company’s team includes architects, engineers, project managers, and real estate experts who work together to ensure the success of every project.

In addition to its real estate development activities, Banan Real Estate involves in community development initiatives. The company commits to supporting social and cultural projects that contribute to society’s development and improve its residents’ quality of life.

Dar Al Arkan

Dar Al Arkan Real Estate Development Company is one of the largest real estate companies in Saudi Arabia. The company started its journey in 1994 and is headquartered in Riyadh. Its made its way on the Saudi Arabian Stock Exchange and has a market value of $4.6 billion, making it one of the most valuable companies in the country.

The company primarily focuses on developing integrated communities for life in the region. It has delivered over 15,000 residential units and 500,000 square meters of commercial space.

Dar Al Arkan’s vision is to further its leadership position as the most respected and dynamic Saudi Arabian real estate solutions provider. The company’s mission is to develop integrated communities for life in the region.

Sumou Real Estate Company

Sumou Real Estate Company is a leading development management company in Saudi Arabia. Established in 2007, the company has evolved its offerings to become one of the country’s premier providers of real estate development management services.

The company’s integrated services facilitate real estate projects from conception to delivery and help landowners gain maximum returns from their assets. Sumou Real Estate has achieved an honourable image in the industry by providing the best service to its customers, developing innovatively, implementing quality, investing with feasibility, and achieving the highest returns for its customers and shareholders.

As of H1 2021, Sumou Real Estate recorded $126 million in total assets. In October 2021, the company announced that it had acquired 80% of Al-Mahafel Trading and Contracting Company Ltd. Sumou Real Estate Company focuses on real estate development and investment projects in Saudi Arabia.

Sumou Real Estate Company has established itself as a reliable and trustworthy real estate development management company in Saudi Arabia. With its focus on innovation, quality, and feasibility, the company has consistently delivered exceptional services to its customers and achieved high returns for its shareholders.

Alandalus Property Company

Alandalus Property Company is one of the top real estate developers in Saudi Arabia. It came to light in 2006 as a closed shareholding company with a capital of $63.7 million. The company was in on the Saudi Arabian Stock Exchange (Tadawul) in 2015. It has since become a driving force in the Saudi real estate market.

The company’s portfolio includes a variety of projects, including residential, commercial, and hospitality developments. One of their most notable projects is the Alandalus Mall, which opened in 2007. The mall is in Jeddah on King Abdullah Road, opposite King Abdulaziz Square, the new city centre.

Alandalus Property Company has been recognised for its excellence in the real estate sector. In 2021, Forbes ranked the company 45th among the top real estate developers in the MENA region. Additionally, the company won the Best Real Estate Company Award, and the Leading Hospitality Industry Award in Saudi Arabia.

Alargan Real Estate Development

Alargan Real Estate Development is one of the most reputable companies developing high-end projects in the heart of Saudi Arabia. The company started in 2006 with a clear vision of enhancing the country’s economy and developing high-end real estate properties. By the end of 2023, Alargan Developments will have established many projects ranging from residential to commercial and administrative properties.

Alargan’s most notable projects include Sama in Riyadh, Suhoul, and Shurouq. These projects have enhanced the market in Saudi Arabia and catered to a variety of people’s needs, whether on a residential or commercial level. Alargan’s contributions have won several awards from projects launched in Riyadh, Al Khobar, Al Dammam, Jubail, and Yanbu.

ArabMLS Founder

Ahmed Elbatrawy, who leads the Arab MLS platform, aims to simplify property transactions in the Middle East, paving the way for unprecedented global investment opportunities.
